tickets.subject: [Mimecast] Messages on hold for missupport@apr.com
tickets.description:
Mimecast - Messages On Hold

The following messages, addressed to you, are currently on hold within 	the Mimecast service awaiting further action.

To edit multiple messages at the same time, log in to 	mimecast.apr.com (https://mimecast.apr.com/) , 	click the Advanced Menu, then click "Personal On Hold".

For further instructions on how to use the links associated with 	each email, please review the following points:

* Release: Releases the message to your Inbox (future emails from this sender will still be placed On Hold)
* Block: Rejects the email, and blocks future emails from this sender
* Permit: Delivers the email to your Inbox and ensures future emails from this sender are not held.

For more information on the Mimecast digest, please refer to this 	article (http://kb.mimecast.com/Mimecast_Knowledge_Base/Administration_Console/Gateway/Policies/Digest_Sets) .

From Subject Release Block Allow

tickets.subject: Luxe Analytics and the rotating wheel of doom
tickets.raw_subject: Luxe Analytics and the rotating wheel of doom
tickets.description:
Hey there,

 

I’m getting the spinning wheel on LA and it’s not going anywhere. Is there anything you can do on the backend to check for issues to the analytics site?

 

Thanks

-Ricky

 

Ricky Flores

BRE# 02027985

Alain Pinel Realtors

408 565 5626

www.margotandricky.com (http://www.margotandricky.com/)

Stacey Tilford

tickets.subject: FW: Site - Chad Rabello and Karen McDermott
tickets.raw_subject: FW: Site - Chad Rabello and Karen McDermott
tickets.description:
Hi,

 

Please read below.

 

Chad is inquiring on his website.  The team left to another broker.

 

Carol Hennessy

Office Administrator

chennessy@apr.com | 408.913.7925

Alain Pinel Realtors® Saratoga

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

From: Chad Rabello [mailto:chad.rabello@gmail.com]
Sent: Monday, May 07, 2018 1:49 PM
To: Carol Hennessy <chennessy@apr.com>
Subject: Site

 

Hi Carol,

 

I hope all is well

 

I’m reaching out to see if you can please confirm that our APR site has officially been taken down?

 

When we google our name, an incomplete version of our apr site sill appears. Our new company has advised that we reach out to apr directly

 

Thanks Carol

 

 

-- 

 

 

Chad Rabello

m: 408.656.5259

 

 

 

 

NEW YORK | BROOKLYN | EAST HAMPTON | BRIDGEHAMPTON | SOUTHAMPTON | SAG HARBOR | WASHINGTON DC | CHEVY CHASE | ARLINGTON | MCLEAN | BOSTON | CAMBRIDGE | MIAMI | COCONUT GROVE | BEVERLY HILLS | MALIBU | PASADENA | MONTECITO | SANTA BARBARA | BASALT | ASPEN | SAN FRANCISCO | NEWPORT BEACH | NAPLES | CHICAGO | DALLAS | SAN DIEGO

tickets.subject: Q1 2018 reports in e-newsletter
tickets.description:
Hi there,

 

Was wondering if we can get the q1 2018 report to display for addition into the e-newsletter? It’s available under quarterly reports in SAVI, but not available in the “Content Library” for the newsletter? A lot of the 2017 qrter reports are there, but not the newest version.

 

Thanks,

 

Heidi Lewis
MARKETING COORDINATOR

Alain Pinel Realtors®
Los Gatos
Monday through Thursday 8:30 to 5:30 pm

408.357.8695

Mark

 

Mark Kotch, e-pro, SRES
